            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【转发送别！中国工程院院士<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%83%81%E9%93%AD%E8%8A%B3%E9%99%A2%E5%A3%AB%E9%80%9D%E4%B8%96%23&amp;from=default">#郁铭芳院士逝世#</a>】郁铭芳，浙江省鄞县人，中共党员，中国工程院院士，东华大学材料科学与工程学院教授、博士生导师，因病医治无效，于2020年4月12日12时30分在上海逝世，享年93岁。从参与研制并纺出我国第一根合成纤维锦纶6丝，到第一根国产军用降落伞用锦纶长丝……60多年 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ID1TR4sKH" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4493020991063839:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4493020991063839&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E7%AA%97%E5%B8%98%E8%BF%9E%E7%BB%AD%E5%89%A7%E5%B1%8B%E4%B8%BB%E4%B8%80%E5%88%87%E5%AE%89%E5%A5%BD%23&amp;from=default">#武汉窗帘连续剧屋主一切安好#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A2%AB%E6%8B%8D%E6%88%90%E8%BF%9E%E7%BB%AD%E5%89%A7%E7%9A%84%E7%AA%97%E5%B8%98%E6%88%B7%E4%B8%BB%E5%9B%9E%E5%AE%B6%E4%BA%86%23&amp;from=default">#被拍成连续剧的窗帘户主回家了#</a>】近日，武汉一条被拍成连续剧的窗帘引发关注。12日，得知自家窗帘登上热搜的王先生专程回家确认。王先生称，房子打扫通风后忘记关窗，自己和父母最近住在城郊一直没回。对于“人在家中坐，热搜天上来”，王先生很感动，更由衷地感谢一 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ID1J3tIPj" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4493014297083829:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4493014297083829&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=6962201073&amp;cid=4493014577314050&amp;nick=黄肖烊&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2803301701&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4493010097911485" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ID1Chxc8B?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-12 22:09" date="1586700545000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4493010097911485:fromprofile"> 2020-4-12 22:09</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/PBP2P" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【夜读：焦虑的时候，你可以对自己说声“不要紧”】每个人都各有这样或那样的不足。如果我们都能怀着一颗宽容的心，发现自己的长处，扬长避短，适时地宽容自己，也是一种幸福。过于焦虑的时候，你可以对自己说声“不要紧”。你有的是时间，可以慢慢来。只要一直走在路上，就总有希望到达。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ID1Chxc8B" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4493010097911485:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4493010097911485&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->

                    <h4 class="WB_feed_spec_tit W_autocut">【夜读】焦虑的时候，你可以对自己说声“不要紧”</h4>
                                            <div class="WB_feed_spec_brieftxt"><span class="S_txt2">宽容自己，是一种智慧</span></div>

    <!-- 评论头像 -->
    <div class="WB_face W_fl">
        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/impressionWhite"><img alt="情疏忘川" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.640.640.1024/005wRVltly8gj27fhza47j30hs0hsaao.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609504821&amp;ssig=o8kZIClcyj" usercard="id=5066358735"></a>

    <!-- 评论头像 -->
    <!-- 评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
    <div class="list_con" node-type="replywrap">
        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/impressionWhite" usercard="id=5066358735">情疏忘川</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href="//verified.weibo.com/verify"><i title="微博个人认证 " class="W_icon icon_approve"></i></a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a>：为什么很多人焦虑？因为他们清楚自己每天做的事情毫无意义。当你真正开始做一些困难的，有价值的事情时，你的焦虑会慢慢消失。 ​​​        </div>
                <!-- 评论图片的处理 -->

                                <a name="4493004696310516" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ID1tzqtEw?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-12 21:47" date="1586699258000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4493004696310516:fromprofile"> 2020-4-12 21:47</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E6%95%B0%E8%B6%8511%E4%B8%87%23&amp;from=default">#全球新冠肺炎死亡病例数超11万#</a>】美国约翰斯·霍普金斯大学数据显示，截至美国东部时间12日8时57分（北京时间12日20时57分），全球累计死亡病例数已达110042例。美国仍是全球死亡病例最多的国家，死亡病例数达20608例。 ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->
                
				 		    <!--picture_count == 1-->
    <ul class="WB_media_a  WB_media_a_m1 clearfix" action-data="isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;clear_picSrc=%2F%2Fwx4.sinaimg.cn%2Fmw690%2Fa716fd45ly1gdrbkb666nj20ob0obk0y.jpg">

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4493001608797845" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ID1oAAUIJ?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-12 21:35" date="1586698522000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4493001608797845:fromprofile"> 2020-4-12 21:35</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BB%8F%E7%BB%A5%E8%8A%AC%E6%B2%B3%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%BE%BE194%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#经绥芬河输入确诊病例达194例#</a> 中国驻俄领馆提醒勿贸然回国】4月12日，中国驻符拉迪沃斯托克总领馆发布通知：截至目前，通过莫斯科-符拉迪沃斯托克-绥芬河路线输入黑龙江省的新冠肺炎确诊病例已经累计达194例，均为中国籍。总领馆提醒相关中国公民充分考虑疫情形势，特别是莫斯科—符拉迪沃斯托克— ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ID1oAAUIJ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4493001608797845:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4493001608797845&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【可可爱爱！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9D%AD%E5%B7%9E%E9%AB%98%E4%B8%89%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E8%BF%94%E6%A0%A1%E6%88%B4%E5%BF%85%E8%83%9C%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%23&amp;from=default">#杭州高三学生返校戴必胜口罩#</a>】今天，杭州学军等高三开学报到，有一名女生口罩上贴了“必胜”字样的贴纸，她解释原因说：“因为我要高考了，要必胜！”加油！<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4492995959520671:1034-video:1034%3A4492983182229524:page_100206_home:2803301701:4492995959520671:2803301701" title="钱江视频的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wq73Fc" alt="http://t.cn/A6wq73Fc" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>钱江视频的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-12 21:17</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 如果返回的为空，但是有二级评论 -->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492988875044293" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ID143lafz?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-12 20:44" date="1586695485000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492988875044293:fromprofile"> 2020-4-12 20:44</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【英国首相出院：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BA%A6%E7%BF%B0%E9%80%8A%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%E5%90%8E%E4%B8%8D%E4%BC%9A%E7%AB%8B%E5%88%BB%E5%A4%8D%E5%B7%A5%23&amp;from=default">#约翰逊出院后不会立刻复工#</a>】当地时间4月12日中午，因新冠肺炎入院治疗的英国首相鲍里斯·约翰逊顺利出院，不过英国媒体表示，他还将休息一段时间，不会马上回到工作岗位。据首相发言人称，约翰逊将在首相别墅契克斯庄园继续休养。约翰逊还感谢了医治他的医护团队。（人民日报记者强薇 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ID143lafz" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492988875044293:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492988875044293&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%9C%89%E6%88%91%23&amp;from=default">#武汉有我#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%8995%E5%90%8EICU%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%23&amp;from=default">#武汉95后ICU护士#</a>：我希望能保护好这些病人】95后的刘莉莉2月9日奔赴武汉，一直在重症ICU从事护理工作。回想起接到任务那一刻，她说，我觉得自己就该来，去救人去帮忙，出一份自己的力量。一个班次里，她进出病房十几次，4小时里能休息不超过15分钟，身上的汗从穿上防护服一直流到出舱。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ID0ZxtWbC" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492986077135184:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492986077135184&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23180%E5%90%8D%E5%9C%A8%E7%BE%8E%E7%95%99%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E4%B9%98%E4%B8%B4%E6%97%B6%E8%88%AA%E7%8F%AD%E6%8A%B5%E8%BE%BE%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%23&amp;from=default">#180名在美留学生乘临时航班抵达上海#</a>，多为12-16岁，将隔离观察14天】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=上海发布">@上海发布</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;12日下午，在外交部协调下，180名中国留学生搭乘东航MU590航班从美国旧金山抵达上海浦东机场。这批留学生绝大多数人年龄在12-16岁之间。留学生的监护人事先均已签署责任承诺书，自愿承担回国过程中的各种可能风险， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ID0H5D5yo" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492974639316144:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492974639316144&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492967521381268" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ID0vC5Nkw?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-12 19:19" date="1586690395000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492967521381268:fromprofile"> 2020-4-12 19:19</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E7%A7%B0%E5%A4%8D%E5%B7%A5%E5%A4%8D%E4%BA%A7%E4%B8%8D%E8%83%BD%E5%9B%A0%E4%B8%AA%E5%88%AB%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%B5%B0%E5%9B%9E%E5%A4%B4%E8%B7%AF%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山称复工复产不能因个别感染走回头路#</a>】5日，钟南山院士表示，处理好复工复产与疫情防控的关系非常不容易，要一步一步走，考验着我们的领导能力、组织能力、行政能力和医疗防治水平。但是这一步一定要往前走，我们不可能永远采用这种办法（停下来），“不要因为怕个别的一些传染就又走回头路” ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ID0vC5Nkw" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492967521381268:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492967521381268&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%91%E9%93%B6%E6%BD%AD%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E6%9C%80%E5%90%8E%E5%A4%96%E6%8F%B4%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E6%92%A4%E7%A6%BB%23&amp;from=default">#金银潭医院最后外援医疗队撤离#</a>】疫情暴发以来，武汉市金银潭医院共收治2850名新冠肺炎患者。目前在院患者仅有40余人，其中<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%91%E9%93%B6%E6%BD%AD%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E5%8D%B1%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E5%B7%B2%E6%B8%85%E9%9B%B6%23&amp;from=default">#金银潭医院危重症患者已清零#</a>。4月12日下午，金银潭医院最后一支外援医疗队——江苏医疗队返程，金银潭医院送别208名白衣战士凯旋回家…<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4492962300301261:1034-video:1034%3A4492953822101528:page_100206_home:2803301701:4492962300301261:2803301701" title="长江日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wGE2Bd" alt="http://t.cn/A6wGE2Bd" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>长江日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%96%E5%8D%AB%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E7%A7%B0%E5%8C%BB%E6%8A%A4%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%B6%8522000%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#世卫组织称医护人员感染超22000例#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%BB%E6%8A%A4%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E5%A4%9A%E6%95%B0%E8%A2%AB%E5%AE%B6%E5%BA%AD%E6%88%90%E5%91%98%E4%BC%A0%E6%9F%93%23&amp;from=default">#医护人员多数被家庭成员传染#</a>】世界卫生组织在当地时间11日晚发布的每日疫情报告显示，截至4月8日，52个国家和地区累计向世卫组织报告医护人员新冠肺炎感染病例22073例。报告指出，由于缺乏报告医护人员感染情况的系统性机制，目前相关信息较为有限，全球医护人 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ID0g8CGzO" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492957929220132:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492957929220132&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【建方舱、严管控…9图<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%8D%E6%88%98%E7%BB%A5%E8%8A%AC%E6%B2%B3%23&amp;from=default">#再战绥芬河#</a>！】4月11日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%8F%91%E7%94%9F%E4%BB%A5%E6%9D%A5%E5%8D%95%E6%97%A5%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E6%9C%80%E9%AB%98%23&amp;from=default">#疫情发生以来单日境外输入最高#</a>。据黑龙江省卫健委通报，11日0-24时，绥芬河口岸新增境外输入21例（全部中国籍）。绥芬河，这个位于我国东北的边境小城，如何防控疫情？小区实行封闭管理、对边境线24小时巡逻、专家护士湖北归来再次踏上战疫征程…戳↓ ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%85%E8%92%99%E5%8F%A4%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B34%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#内蒙古新增境外输入病例34例#</a>】2020年4月12日7时至16时，内蒙古自治区报告新增境外输入新冠肺炎确诊病例34例。34名患者均来自俄罗斯由满洲里公路口岸入境，经专家会诊，诊断为新冠肺炎确诊病例。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6wGWsTm" alt="http://t.cn/A6wGWsTm" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【广西<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%97%E4%B8%B9%E5%86%9C%E8%B4%B8%E5%B8%82%E5%9C%BA%E7%81%AB%E7%81%BE%E4%B8%80%E6%B6%88%E9%98%B2%E5%91%98%E7%89%BA%E7%89%B2%23&amp;from=default">#南丹农贸市场火灾一消防员牺牲#</a>】4月12日4时30分许，广西河池南丹县城关贸易市场发生火灾后坍塌，3名消防救援人员在清理余火时被埋压，其中2人被救出送往医院治疗，被埋压于最深处的韦安伟同志于当日下午15时19分被救出，经现场医务人员确认，已无生命体征，壮烈牺牲，年仅26周岁。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%B9%BF%E8%A5%BF%E6%B6%88%E9%98%B2?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=广西消防">@广西消防</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=5891076275&amp;cid=4492941207190042&amp;nick=今天的cc达成目标了吗&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2803301701&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                                <a name="4492931115282418" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICZyTmaci?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-12 16:55" date="1586681715000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492931115282418:fromprofile"> 2020-4-12 16:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E6%9A%82%E4%B8%8D%E8%80%83%E8%99%91%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#北京高校暂不考虑开学#</a>】北京市新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作新闻发布会上，市教委新闻发言人李奕介绍，对于高校学生的要求仍然是不离家不返校。高校开学意味着大人群聚集，食堂、宿舍、图书馆等都会出现相对集中的人流，所以对开学条件的要求会更高。“一定要确保没有隐患的情况下，才会开学。” ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICZyTmaci" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492931115282418:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492931115282418&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【它来了，湖北的鸭脖、鸭翅来了！<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/c9/2018new_chongjing_org.png" title="[憧憬]" alt="[憧憬]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】5、4、3、2、1，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%BA%E9%84%82%E4%B8%8B%E5%8D%95%23&amp;from=default">#为鄂下单#</a>！4月13日21:00，人民日报新媒体联合<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%B7%98%E5%AE%9D?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=淘宝">@淘宝</a> ，共同发起<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E5%86%B2%E9%B8%AD%23&amp;from=default">#湖北冲鸭#</a>直播专场。知名主播<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E8%96%87%E5%A8%85viyaaa?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=薇娅viyaaa">@薇娅viyaaa</a> 将和神秘嘉宾一起为湖北农产品助力，就在<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> ！全国的吃货们，准时围观，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%88%91%E4%B8%BA%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E8%83%96%E4%B8%89%E6%96%A4%23&amp;from=default">#我为湖北胖三斤#</a>！ ​​​​                                            </div>

                <ul class="clearfix">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%B8%88%E7%94%9F%E8%BF%94%E6%A0%A1%E6%9D%A1%E4%BB%B6%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%23&amp;from=default">#北京师生返校条件发布#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BF%94%E4%BA%AC%E5%B8%88%E7%94%9F%E9%A1%BB%E5%B1%85%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%96%E9%9B%86%E4%B8%AD%E5%8C%BB%E5%AD%A6%E8%A7%82%E5%AF%9F14%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#返京师生须居家或集中医学观察14天#</a>】北京市新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作新闻发布会上，市教委新闻发言人李奕明确师生返校条件：<br>一是近期未离京并连续14天居家观察且无症状的师生员工，可返校开学。<br>二是近期从境外、京外返京的师生员工，须居家或集中医学观察14天且核酸 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICZruu5jw" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492926527170270:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492926527170270&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【四川凉山通报：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%9C%A8%E9%87%8C%E7%81%AB%E7%81%BE%E7%B3%BB11%E5%B2%81%E7%94%B7%E5%AD%A9%E7%82%B9%E7%87%83%E6%9D%BE%E9%92%88%E5%BC%95%E5%8F%91%23&amp;from=default">#木里火灾系11岁男孩点燃松针引发#</a>】据木里县森林公安局办公室消息，经查：木里县项脚乡瓦科梁子“3.28”森林火灾案系犯罪嫌疑人田某某（男，11岁）于2020年3月28日14时在木里县项脚乡项脚村瓦科组田某某家后山处用打火机点燃松针和木罗松烟熏洞内松鼠时不慎失火引发。目前此案正在进 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICZrlBl69" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492926438899241:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492926438899241&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=ICZlBdzfc&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609504789&amp;ssig=%2B0nSPLqcer" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492922873233746" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICZlBdzfc?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-12 16:22" date="1586679750000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492922873233746:fromprofile"> 2020-4-12 16:22</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%AB%E5%81%A5%E5%A7%94%E8%A7%A3%E7%AD%94%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%90%8E%E8%A6%81%E5%9D%9A%E6%8C%81%E5%93%AA%E4%BA%9B%E4%B9%A0%E6%83%AF%23&amp;from=default">#卫健委解答疫情后要坚持哪些习惯#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E8%BF%87%E5%90%8E%E5%93%AA%E4%BA%9B%E4%B9%A0%E6%83%AF%E8%BF%98%E8%A6%81%E9%95%BF%E6%9C%9F%E5%9D%9A%E6%8C%81%23&amp;from=default">#疫情过后哪些习惯还要长期坚持#</a>？国家卫生健康委规划司司长毛群安：①保持良好饮食习惯，集体就餐时推广分餐制，使用公筷公勺，拒绝野味。还要养成不吸烟不劝酒不浪费，减盐减油减糖；②保持良好行为习惯，保持社交距离，科学戴口罩，注意咳嗽礼仪；③保持良好卫 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICZlBdzfc" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492922873233746:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492922873233746&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <!-- 赞 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【扩散周知！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E9%AB%98%E4%B8%89%E5%88%9D%E4%B8%89%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#北京高三初三开学时间#</a>】今天，北京市明确优先组织高三和初三年级开学，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E9%AB%98%E4%B8%894%E6%9C%8827%E6%97%A5%E8%BF%94%E6%A0%A1%23&amp;from=default">#北京高三4月27日返校#</a>；初三年级按5月11日做好返校学习准备。其他各年级，以及中职学校、高等学校和幼儿园的返校安排，待确定后另行通知。（首都教育） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E9%AB%98%E8%80%83%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%E5%AE%9A%E4%BA%86%23&amp;from=default">#北京高考时间定了#</a>：7月7日-10日】今天，北京市明确了2020年北京高考时间为7月7日至10日，北京中考时间为7月17日至19日。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E4%B8%AD%E8%80%83%E9%AB%98%E8%80%83%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%E7%A1%AE%E5%AE%9A%23&amp;from=default">#北京中考高考时间确定#</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【正在直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E4%BB%8B%E7%BB%8D%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E7%83%AD%E7%82%B9%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山介绍疫情防控热点问题#</a>】北上广深等国际交往频繁的大城市外防输入面临哪些挑战、将如何应对？什么时候可以摘口罩？广州举行疫情防控专访活动，钟南山院士现场解答。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 联动南方+正在直播，一起关注↓↓<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4492918569807188:1034-video:1034%3A4492938667819033:page_100206_home:2803301701:4492918569807188:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wGJB3e" alt="http://t.cn/A6wGJB3e" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div node-type="feed_list_repeat" class="WB_feed_repeat S_bg1" style=""><!-- 评论盖楼 -->

    <!-- 评论头像 -->
    <div class="WB_face W_fl">
        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/3291427094"><img alt="发力者" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.640.640.1024/c42f3116ly8ge216ndybrj20hs0hs407.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609504896&amp;ssig=URqEbon%2Biz" usercard="id=3291427094"></a>

    <!-- 评论头像 -->
    <!-- 评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
    <div class="list_con" node-type="replywrap">
        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/3291427094" usercard="id=3291427094">发力者</a>：今年袁老90岁，钟老84岁，二老至今还只是工程院院士，咋不能当选中科院院士？ 是不是指标被高福、舒红兵等“庸人”占据了？此前，国家对钱学森、路甬祥等老一辈科学家都已评选为“两院院士”，二老也应如此！这才是一个国家和民族对二老应有的态度！最后祝愿：二老身体健康，携手寿比南山！        </div>
                <!-- 评论图片的处理 -->
                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="comment_media_disp"></div>
                            <!-- 评论图片的处理 -->
        <!-- 对评论的操作 -->
        <div class="WB_func clearfix">
            <div class="WB_handle W_fr">
                <ul class="clearfix">
                    <!-- 投诉 -->

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/5267800301" usercard="id=5267800301">Linda学友</a>：【美国神药<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/c9/2018new_chongjing_org.png" title="[憧憬]" alt="[憧憬]" type="face"><a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%91%9E%E5%BE%B7%E8%A5%BF%E9%9F%A6%E4%B8%B4%E5%BA%8A%E8%AF%95%E9%AA%8C%E7%BB%93%E6%9E%9C%E5%87%BA%E7%82%89%23&amp;from=default">#瑞德西韦临床试验结果出炉#</a> 患者出现这些副作用！】 数据显示， 60%的患者出现了副作用，最常见的是肝酶升高、腹泻、皮疹、肾损伤和低血压；23%出现了严重副作用，包括多器官功能障碍综合征、急性肾脏损伤和低血压。 此外，中国方面，因入组停滞，针对重症患者的研究已停止。        </div>

                                                                                                                        【人民直播：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%BB%8B%E7%BB%8D%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%98%A5%E5%AD%A3%E5%86%9C%E4%B8%9A%E7%94%9F%E4%BA%A7%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%23&amp;from=default">#湖北介绍武汉春季农业生产情况#</a>】今天下午四点，湖北省新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情防控工作指挥部召开第71场新闻发布会，介绍武汉市农业企业复工复产和春季农业生产情况，并回答记者提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播，一起关注！ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4492917303782501:1034-video:1034%3A4492929759117329:page_100206_home:2803301701:4492917303782501:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wGxmrl" alt="http://t.cn/A6wGxmrl" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B8%85%E5%8D%8E%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E7%B1%8D%E5%A5%B3%E7%94%9F%E8%8B%B1%E6%96%87%E6%BC%94%E8%AE%B2%23&amp;from=default">#清华武汉籍女生英文演讲#</a>：疫情后，我读懂了万众一心】清华大学武汉籍学生张睿茹近日在演讲中讲述自己疫情期间的经历。她说，作为00后，从小知道国歌中有“万众一心”，一场疫情真正理解了其中的含义。从2003年抗击“非典”到2008年汶川抗震救灾，再到今年抗击新冠肺炎疫情，中国人民面对挑战始终团 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICZc3m7t4" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492916955271926:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492916955271926&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4492905869791635" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICYUaF5fB?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-12 15:14" date="1586675696000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492905869791635:fromprofile"> 2020-4-12 15:14</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【国家卫健委：各地要<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%81%9A%E5%A5%BD%E8%BE%83%E9%95%BF%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%E5%BA%94%E5%AF%B9%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%87%86%E5%A4%87%23&amp;from=default">#做好较长时间应对境外输入疫情准备#</a>】国家卫健委新闻发言人米锋：4月11日，31省区市新增97例境外输入病例，此为<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%8F%91%E7%94%9F%E4%BB%A5%E6%9D%A5%E5%8D%95%E6%97%A5%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E6%9C%80%E9%AB%98%23&amp;from=default">#疫情发生以来单日境外输入最高#</a>，提示境外输入风险持续增大，给入境城市带来压力，各地要做好较长时间应对境外疫情输入的工作准备，进一步提升检测和救治能力。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICYUaF5fB" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492905869791635:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492905869791635&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                         <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->

    </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%9B%B4%E6%92%AD%23&amp;from=default">#人民直播#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%A1%E9%99%A2%E8%81%94%E9%98%B2%E8%81%94%E6%8E%A7%E6%9C%BA%E5%88%B6%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#国务院联防联控机制发布会#</a>】国务院联防联控机制定于4月12日15时召开新闻发布会，介绍深入开展爱国卫生运动推进城乡环境整治工作情况，全国爱卫办、生态环境部、住房城乡建设部、农业农村部有关司局负责人将回答媒体提问。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> 正在直播↓↓ <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4492902224408417:1034-video:1034%3A4492917193244674:page_100206_home:2803301701:4492902224408417:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wG4PRx" alt="http://t.cn/A6wG4PRx" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->

            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
                            <div comment_id="4492903033945252" class="list_li S_line1 clearfix">
                <!-- 评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
                <div class="list_con">
                    <div class="WB_text">
                        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/1661730680" usercard="id=1661730680">快乐的玛丽mm</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href=""><i title="" class="" node-type="daren"></i></a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member2"></em></a>：如果按各国上报的确诊数跟死亡数去判断能否批复包机，那非洲可能永远等不到应急的航班了，因为非洲一检测能力有限，二当地人就医意识差，疟疾发烧死亡都是常事更别说症状不严重的新冠了。就这种医疗体系，我所在国的总统还鼓励人们不要怕新冠，让大家继续去教堂，去礼拜，太可怕了，希望更多人关注吧                    </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E5%AE%98%E6%84%9F%E8%B0%A2%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%BF%AB%E9%80%9F%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E7%97%85%E6%AF%92%23&amp;from=default">#英国医疗官感谢中国快速鉴定新冠病毒#</a>：让世界能够迅速开展疫苗研发】11日，英国NHS医疗总监史蒂芬·波伊斯说，中国科学家在早期就完成对新冠病毒的鉴定和测序、并提交基因组序列信息，这使得世界各地能迅速开始疫苗研发，这是已知的“最了不起的科学应对”。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4492898781338580:2017607-video:2017607%3A4492815737225230:page_100206_home:2803301701:4492898781338580:2803301701" title="海客新闻的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wbZbN9" alt="http://t.cn/A6wbZbN9" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>海客新闻的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492893244365551" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICYzOijG7?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-12 14:24" date="1586672686000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492893244365551:fromprofile"> 2020-4-12 14:24</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【输入性疫情严峻，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%85%E8%92%99%E5%8F%A4%E6%BB%A1%E6%B4%B2%E9%87%8C%E5%8A%A0%E7%B4%A7%E5%BB%BA%E8%AE%BE%E5%A4%87%E7%94%A8%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#内蒙古满洲里加紧建设备用医院#</a>】截至4月12日7时，内蒙古自治区满洲里市收治的新冠肺炎确诊病例36例，疑似病例12例，这些病例均是来自俄罗斯的输入性病例。鉴于输入性疫情的严峻形势，满洲里市在原扎煤公司总医院基础上建设备用医院，备用医院一期改建容纳床位数340多个，二期容纳 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICYzOijG7" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492893244365551:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492893244365551&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492885753607065" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICYnJf8mt?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-12 13:55" date="1586670900000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492885753607065:fromprofile"> 2020-4-12 13:55</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E8%A5%BF%E4%B8%80%E5%86%9C%E8%B4%B8%E5%B8%82%E5%9C%BA%E7%81%AB%E7%81%BE%E6%9C%89%E6%B6%88%E9%98%B2%E5%91%98%E8%A2%AB%E5%9F%8B%E5%8E%8B%23&amp;from=default">#广西一农贸市场火灾有消防员被埋压#</a>】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E6%B6%88%E9%98%B2?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=中国消防">@中国消防</a> ，4月12日4时31分，广西河池一农贸市场发生火灾，消防指战员在清理火场时突然坍塌，造成3名消防员被埋压，截至13时30分，2名消防员已救出，生命体征平稳，另外1名消防员位置已确定，正在全力抢救。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%B4%B5%E5%B7%9E%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%23&amp;from=default">#贵州开学时间#</a>公布】①本科高校（含研究生）、高职、中职学校毕业年级，4月21日后分批开学；②高一高二年级、初一初二年级、中职学校一二年级4月28日做开学准备；③本科高校（含研究生）和高职院校非毕业年级、小学、幼儿园，5月中旬后视情况再确定开学时间。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%B4%B5%E5%B7%9E%E9%AB%98%E6%A0%A1%E5%BC%80%E5%AD%A6%E6%97%B6%E9%97%B4%E5%85%AC%E5%B8%83%23&amp;from=default">#贵州高校开学时间公布#</a> ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICYeTFjAe" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492880279846730:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492880279846730&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【河南<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%AB%98%E4%B8%89%E5%AD%A6%E7%94%9F%E5%9C%A8%E9%A3%9F%E5%A0%82%E8%80%83%E5%9C%BA%E5%BC%8F%E5%B0%B1%E9%A4%90%23&amp;from=default">#高三学生在食堂考场式就餐#</a> 学生：很有安全感】4月10日，河南郑州第七中学高三学生复课，学校食堂的餐桌上都设置了隔板，学生们要按照隔板上的姓名就座。学生们说，有自己的专属座位很有安全感，也有学生调侃，感觉食堂变成了考场，吃出了考试的感觉。<a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4492869094278203:2017607-video:2017607%3A4492706286862340:page_100206_home:2803301701:4492869094278203:2803301701" title="人民视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6w4kHmC" alt="http://t.cn/A6w4kHmC" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4492863251683999" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICXNr745h?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-12 12:25" date="1586665535000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492863251683999:fromprofile"> 2020-4-12 12:25</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【警方通报<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E5%B7%9E%E7%94%B7%E5%AD%90%E6%AE%B4%E6%89%93%E4%B8%A4%E6%8A%A4%E5%A3%AB%E8%A2%AB%E5%88%91%E6%8B%98%23&amp;from=default">#广州男子殴打两护士被刑拘#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/f6/2018new_nu_org.png" title="[怒]" alt="[怒]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】4月11日，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%B9%BF%E5%B7%9E%E5%85%AC%E5%AE%89?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=广州公安">@广州公安</a> 通报，7日12时许，荔湾警方接报称某医院有病人殴打护士。半小时后，民警即将嫌疑人抓获归案。嫌疑人梁某交代，治疗期间由于不满护士责怪其损坏探热针，一时冲动便殴打了护士，随后逃离现场。目前，犯罪嫌疑人已被刑事拘留，两名被打护士 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICXNr745h" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492863251683999:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492863251683999&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%93%88%E5%B0%94%E6%BB%A8%E5%85%AC%E5%B8%832%E4%BE%8B%E6%9C%AC%E5%9C%9F%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%BD%A8%E8%BF%B9%23&amp;from=default">#哈尔滨公布2例本土确诊病例轨迹#</a>】4月11日0时-24时哈尔滨新增2例确诊患者活动轨迹公布如下：<br>病例一：张某，男，67岁，退休。常住址：哈尔滨市香坊区农林街，系4月10日已发布确诊病例陈某密切接触者。<br>3月27日，居家（其间曾佩戴口罩在小区内散步）。<br>3月28日8时许，乘120路公交车由文政街站到道外 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICXwlakVr" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492852652463721:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492852652463721&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2803301701/ICXwlakVr&amp;mid=4492852652463721&amp;name=人民日报&amp;uid=2803301701&amp;domain=rmrb&amp;pid=a716fd45ly1gdqu3wlj2nj20ob0obk0y" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>520</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492838861582874" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICXa66DMe?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-12 10:48" date="1586659720000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492838861582874:fromprofile"> 2020-4-12 10:48</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E5%85%B3%E4%BA%8E%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E7%9A%84%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%88%A4%E6%96%AD%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山关于疫情的最新判断#</a>】今天，人民日报专访钟南山。①<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%87%BA%E7%8E%B0%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E7%AC%AC%E4%BA%8C%E6%B3%A2%E5%A4%A7%E6%9A%B4%E5%8F%91%E5%87%A0%E7%8E%87%E5%BE%88%E5%B0%8F%23&amp;from=default">#中国出现疫情第二波大暴发几率很小#</a>；②现在还不是摘口罩的时候；③目前谈全球疫情拐点为时尚早，不可测因素很多……你关心的问题，钟南山给出最新判断↓↓转发周知！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492831823130344" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICWYKd8lq?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-12 10:20" date="1586658042000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492831823130344:fromprofile"> 2020-4-12 10:20</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E8%AF%B4%E7%BE%A4%E4%BD%93%E5%85%8D%E7%96%AB%E6%98%AF%E6%9C%80%E6%B6%88%E6%9E%81%E5%81%9A%E6%B3%95%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山说群体免疫是最消极做法#</a>：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E8%AF%B4%E7%BE%A4%E4%BD%93%E5%85%8D%E7%96%AB%E6%98%AF%E4%B8%80%E7%99%BE%E5%A4%9A%E5%B9%B4%E5%89%8D%E7%9A%84%E6%80%9D%E8%B7%AF%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山说群体免疫是一百多年前的思路#</a>】钟南山接受人民日报专访时表示，对待疫情最为消极的做法就是所谓的自然免疫，这是一百多年前的思路了，那时人类没有什么办法，只能任由病毒感染，感染后活下来的人自然获得抗体。现在再用这种方法应对新冠病毒我不赞同。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICWYKd8lq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492831823130344:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492831823130344&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="S_txt1" action-type="fl_like" action-data="object_id=4492831978629364&amp;object_type=comment&amp;o_uid=2629251465&amp;commentmid=4492831823130344" title="赞"><span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>131</em></span></a>                    </span></li>
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-12 10:21</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E8%AF%B4%E7%9B%AE%E5%89%8D%E6%9C%AA%E5%8F%91%E7%8E%B0%E7%89%B9%E6%95%88%E8%8D%AF%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山说目前未发现特效药#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E4%BB%8B%E7%BB%8D%E6%B0%AF%E5%96%B9%E8%BF%9E%E8%8A%B1%E6%B8%85%E7%98%9F%E7%AD%89%E6%98%AF%E6%9C%89%E6%95%88%E8%8D%AF%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山介绍氯喹连花清瘟等是有效药#</a>】钟南山表示，我们现在试验的一些药物，比如氯喹，实验结果肯定是有效的，还有一些中药，比如连花清瘟，我们不仅做了离体实验，还在P3实验室发现，它抗病毒作用不强，但抗炎症方面表现突出。此外还有中药血必净，它的主要成分包括红 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICWWKpnxp" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492830586048683:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492830586048683&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    </div>
                </div>

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492829428736585" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICWUSAEMF?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-12 10:11" date="1586657471000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492829428736585:fromprofile"> 2020-4-12 10:11</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E8%AF%B4%E5%8A%A8%E7%89%A9%E9%97%B4%E4%BC%A0%E6%92%AD%E7%8E%B0%E5%9C%A8%E4%B8%8B%E7%BB%93%E8%AE%BA%E5%A4%AA%E6%97%A9%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山说动物间传播现在下结论太早#</a>】钟南山接受人民日报专访时表示，狗、猫、老虎等一些动物核酸检测阳性，究竟是污染造成的，还是感染的，有待观察。有些动物身上原本就带有一些病毒，不一定有症状，也不一定会传染。现在就认为这些动物身上的新冠病毒既能传染人，又能传染动物，而且都能致病，结 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICWUSAEMF" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492829428736585:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492829428736585&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609504796&amp;ssig=NwuzdC8sOM" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492827138762896" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICWRbALD2?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-12 10:02" date="1586656925000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492827138762896:fromprofile"> 2020-4-12 10:02</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E8%AF%B4%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E7%9A%84%E8%80%81%E7%99%BE%E5%A7%93%E5%BE%88%E5%8F%AF%E7%88%B1%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山说中国的老百姓很可爱#</a>】钟南山接受人民日报专访时回忆：”我记得当时封城以后，不到一两天，我的几个外国朋友也跟我说，怎么突然，北京、武汉、广州突然都安静下来了，车也没了，也少了，这个我看在其他地方很难做到，所以这个是一个非常好的一个实践，所以回过来这个经验是很重要。”&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICWRbALD2" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492827138762896:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492827138762896&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=ICWQgxhmW&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民日报"><img usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.28.0.969.969.1024/a716fd45ly8gdijd1zmonj20sa0saaby.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609504796&amp;ssig=NwuzdC8sOM" width="50" height="50" alt="人民日报" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492826567931594" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICWQgxhmW?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-12 09:59" date="1586656789000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492826567931594:fromprofile"> 2020-4-12 09:59</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E7%A7%B0%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%8B%90%E7%82%B9%E6%81%90%E8%BF%98%E9%9C%80%E4%B8%A4%E5%91%A8%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山称全球疫情拐点恐还需两周#</a>】钟南山接受人民日报专访时表示，到不到拐点，要看政府能不能出手进行强力的干预。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E7%A7%B0%E8%B0%88%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%8B%90%E7%82%B9%E4%B8%BA%E6%97%B6%E5%B0%9A%E6%97%A9%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山称谈全球疫情拐点为时尚早#</a>。其他国家有很多不可测的因素，所以现在让我预测全球拐点，就比预测中国的难得多。照目前这个形势发展下去，恐怕还需要两周。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICWQgxhmW" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492826567931594:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492826567931594&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="S_txt1" action-type="fl_like" action-data="object_id=4492826832332541&amp;object_type=comment&amp;o_uid=7358239636&amp;commentmid=4492826567931594" title="赞"><span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>223</em></span></a>                    </span></li>

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-4-12 10:00</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E8%AF%B4%E6%AD%A4%E6%AC%A1%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E6%98%AF%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E5%8F%B2%E4%B8%8A%E7%9A%84%E5%A3%AE%E4%B8%BE%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山说此次防控是疫情防控史上的壮举#</a>】钟南山接受人民日报专访时表示，武汉解封了，我也很高兴。疫情暴发时，中央果断出手，对武汉城市交通进行管控，其他地方采取群防群治措施，是非常成功的，在疫情防控史上，这也称得上是一个壮举。 <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4492824709473743:1042163-video:1042163%3A4492824595595304:page_100206_home:2803301701:4492824709473743:2803301701" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6wbUR9A" alt="http://t.cn/A6wbUR9A" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/rmrb?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2803301701&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民日报</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4492822889762454" target="_blank" href="/2803301701/ICWKkEXEW?from=page_1002062803301701_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-04-12 09:45" date="1586655912000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4492822889762454:fromprofile"> 2020-4-12 09:45</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【钟南山：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E9%80%A0%E6%88%90%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%BA%8C%E6%AC%A1%E6%9A%B4%E5%8F%91%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E6%80%A7%E5%B0%8F%23&amp;from=default">#境外输入造成中国疫情二次暴发可能性小#</a>】钟南山接受人民日报专访时表示，境外输入病例传播的危险性肯定存在，但造成疫情暴发可能性比较小。我国社区居民都有很强的自我防护意识，一旦有人出现发烧等症状，也能够快速报告或接受诊断，进而隔离。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%87%BA%E7%8E%B0%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E7%AC%AC%E4%BA%8C%E6%B3%A2%E5%A4%A7%E6%9A%B4%E5%8F%91%E5%87%A0%E7%8E%87%E5%BE%88%E5%B0%8F%23&amp;from=default">#中国出现疫情第二波大暴发几率很小#</a>。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICWKkEXEW" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492822889762454:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492822889762454&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民日报">
                                                                                                                        【听话！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E7%A7%B0%E8%BF%98%E4%B8%8D%E6%98%AF%E6%91%98%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E7%9A%84%E6%97%B6%E5%80%99%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山称还不是摘口罩的时候#</a>】钟南山接受人民日报专访时表示，现在还不是摘口罩的时候。现在国内外情况悬殊，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%B7%B2%E6%AD%A5%E5%85%A5%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E7%AC%AC%E4%BA%8C%E9%98%B6%E6%AE%B5%23&amp;from=default">#中国已步入疫情第二阶段#</a>，而其他一些主要国家还处在大暴发的第一阶段。这意味着人传人的几率非常高，戴口罩仍是很重要的自我防护手段，现在就提出不戴为时过早。不过，在疫情不严 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2803301701/ICWGueKAH" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4492820503515691:2803301701" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4492820503515691&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
                        <!-- 用于作为插入更多二级评论的锚点 -->

            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">

suda-data=\"key=tblog_home_new&value=feed_time:4493010097911485:fromprofile\"> 2020-4-12 22:09<\/a> 来自 <a class=\"S_txt2\" suda-uatrack=\"key=profile_feed&value=pubfrom_guest\"                                                                                           【夜读：焦虑的时候，你可以对自己说声“不要紧”】每个人都各有这样或那样的不足。如果我们都能怀着一颗宽容的心，发现自己的长处，扬长避短，适时地宽容自己，也是一种幸福。过于焦虑的时候，你可以对自己说声“不要紧”。你有的是时间，可以慢慢来。只要一直走在路上，就总有希望到达。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/2803301701\/ID1Chxc8B\" class=\"WB_text_opt\" suda-uatrack=\"key=original_blog_unfold&value=click_unfold:4493010097911485:2803301701\" action-type=\"fl_unfold\" action-data=\"mid=4493010097911485&is_settop&is_sethot&is_setfanstop&is_setyoudao&is_from_ad=0\">展开全文<i class=\"W_ficon ficon_arrow_down\">c<\/i><\/a>                                                                                                              【英国首相出院：<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\"                                                【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" extra-data=\"type=atname\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/n\/%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83?from=feed&loc=at\" usercard=\"name=上海发布\">@上海发布<\/a>&nbsp;&nbsp;12日下午，在外交部协调下，180名中国留学生搭乘东航MU590航班从美国旧金山抵达上海浦东机场。这批留学生绝大多数人年龄在12-16岁之间。留学生的监护人事先均已签署责任承诺书，自愿承担回国过程中的各种可能风险， ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\"                                                                                           【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E7%A7%B0%E5%A4%8D%E5%B7%A5%E5%A4%8D%E4%BA%A7%E4%B8%8D%E8%83%BD%E5%9B%A0%E4%B8%AA%E5%88%AB%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E8%B5%B0%E5%9B%9E%E5%A4%B4%E8%B7%AF%23&from=default\">#钟南山称复工复产不能因个别感染走回头路#<\/a>】5日，钟南山院士表示，处理好复工复产与疫情防控的关系非常不容易，要一步一步走，考验着我们的领导能力、组织能力、行政能力和医疗防治水平。但是这一步一定要往前走，我们不可能永远采用这种办法（停下来），“不要因为怕个别的一些传染就又走回头路”                                                                                                              【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" <a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\"                                                【建方舱、严管控…9图<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%86%8D%E6%88%98%E7%BB%A5%E8%8A%AC%E6%B2%B3%23&from=default\">#再战绥芬河#<\/a>！】4月11日，<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%8F%91%E7%94%9F%E4%BB%A5%E6%9D%A5%E5%8D%95%E6%97%A5%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E6%9C%80%E9%AB%98%23&from=default\">#疫情发生以来单日境外输入最高#<\/a>。据黑龙江省卫健委通报，11日0-24时，绥芬河口岸新增境外输入21例（全部中国籍）。绥芬河，这个位于我国东北的边境小城，如何防控疫情？小区实行封闭管理、对边境线24小时巡逻、专家护士湖北归来再次踏上战疫征程…戳↓
